entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight then periods of light snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
